rules.1: The password must be at least 5 characters long to ensure basic security.
rules.2: The password should contain at least one uppercase letter to increase complexity and security.
rules.3: The password must include at least one number to prevent it from being easily guessed and to enhance safety.
rules.4: The password must contain at least one special character to ensure it is not too simple.
rules.5: The password must contain at least 3 consecutive ascending or descending alphanumeric characters.
